title: Docker and Containerization: Streamlining Development and Onboarding
intro: In the world of modern software development, Docker has emerged as a game-changer, revolutionizing how teams build, ship, and run applications. In this blog, we will delve into the transformative power of Docker and containerization, exploring its benefits, ease of use, and impact on developer productivity.

title: How I Cracked My Interview at Zomato: A Detailed Guide
intro: I recently got selected for the SDE-1 role at Zomato, and today I want to share my experience with the recruitment process and offer some tips that I found helpful.

title: Embracing DevOps: A Comprehensive Approach to Software Development
intro: In the fast-paced world of software development, adopting DevOps practices has become essential for teams aiming to streamline processes, enhance collaboration, and deliver high-quality software consistently. In this blog, we will explore how DevOps principles, coupled with tools like GitHub Actions and Docker, can revolutionize your development workflow.
